texts.name: Cesare
texts.biography: When Cesare was a child, he has fallen a victim of a hypnotist named Caligari. After 28 years of killing his master`s enemies, Cesare suddenly regained his free will. Now, he knows everything about hypnosis and feels ready to use it, in order to take his revange.

specialty.description:
{Hypnotize}
Casts Hypnotize with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit.
